desc.en: Set the amount of current available for an installation of chargers.
Set the charging mode of the charger. Available modes are: Default charging, Scheduled charging, and Automatic charging.
desc.no: Sett lademodus for laderen. Tilgjengelige moduser er: Standardlading, Planlagt lading, og Automatisk lading.
